Key Match Events: Jos Buttler and Alex Hales shared an unbeaten 170-run stand
Chris Jordan took 3 wickets for 43 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler praised the team's character and performance
Rohit Sharma criticized India's performance, especially with the ball
Miscellaneous Highlights: India posted 168-6 after being put into bat
England made a blistering start in reply, reaching 63 inside the power play
